Source.Name: ruby
Source.Description: Ruby is a dynamic, reflexive, object-oriented programming language that blends parts of Perl, Smalltalk, Eiffel, Ada, and Lisp to create a language that balanced functional and imperative programming. It was created by Yukihiro "matz" Matsumoto

Package.Name: ruby-devel
